radiographic_examinations.findings: Ventricular enlargement that was slightly less than that which preceded her shunt.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Increased ventricular size and effacement of the cortical sulci after head injury.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Partial aqueductal stenosis and no acute intracranial abnormality.
Increased ventricular size and effacement of the cortical sulci.
